articles.title: Oppo shares Android 14 update timeline, Find N2 Flip missing - Android Police
articles.description: The list refers to the international models sold in Europe
articles.content: The last few months have been particularly challenging for Chinese smartphone maker Oppo, especially in Europe. It has already ceased operations in Germany, with reports of France following suit. But… [+1723 chars]
